info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 1 at 6:18PM MDT until April 1 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Southwestern Lincoln County in central New Mexico... Southeastern Socorro County in central New Mexico...
* Until 745 PM MDT.
* At 618 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was located across Carrizozo and all points southward.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility.
SOURCE...Law enforcement and Department of Highways reported.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* Locations impacted include... Carrizozo, White Oaks and Oscuro.
This includes U.S. Highway 380 and 70 between Mile Markers 44 and 74 and U.S. Highway 54 from Mile Marker 78 to Mile Marker 123. U.S. Highway 54 is closed from Carrizozo to Tularosa due to brownout conditions.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 7:45 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 7:45 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 1 at 6:18PM MDT until April 1 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 7:45 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 7:45 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
